## Example

Very basic program that I used to test this version

### Source Code

```c
void main()
{
    int32 a = 42;
    int32 b = a;
}
```
---
### Compiled Mips
```asm
# Assembly generated by ecc (Evil C Compiler)

.text
.globl _start

_start:
        jal     main
        li      $v0, 10
        syscall 

main:
        addi    $sp, $sp, -12
        sw      $ra, 8($sp)

        li      $t0, 42
        sw      $t0, 4($sp)

        lw      $t0, 4($sp)
        sw      $t0, 0($sp)

        lw      $ra, 8($sp)
        addi    $sp, $sp, 12

        jr      $ra
```
